name: Sarah Johnson
title: Senior Partner
bio: Sarah has over 20 years of experience in corporate mergers and acquisitions. She leads major negotiations and advises multinational firms.

name: James Lee
title: Associate Attorney
bio: James protects intellectual property rights for startups and artists. He assists with patents, trademarks, and copyright law.

name: Maria Gonzalez
title: Litigation Specialist
bio: Maria is known for her courtroom strategy and litigation skills. She handles complex civil cases with strong advocacy.

name: David Kim
title: Partner
bio: David guides families through divorce, custody, and adoption. His compassionate approach makes complex issues easier to handle.

name: Emily Patel
title: Legal Consultant
bio: Emily advises clients on real estate deals and zoning laws. She ensures smooth property transactions and legal compliance.

name: Michael Thompson
title: Criminal Defense Lawyer
bio: Michael defends clients in criminal cases with dedication. He fights for fair trials and justice in every courtroom appearance.

name: Anna Rossi
title: Immigration Attorney
bio: Anna helps clients achieve legal residency and citizenship. She supports families and individuals throughout immigration processes.

name: Robert White
title: Senior Counsel
bio: Robert advises on corporate tax planning and legal compliance. He simplifies complex tax structures for business clients.

name: Linda Nguyen
title: Junior Associate
bio: Linda supports environmental justice through legal action. She works on pollution, land use, and conservation cases.
